head.title: VisualDCT Release Notes
head.scope: This document is contains release notes of the current build.
head.audience: The audience of this document are all users of this VisualDCT build.

section.title: Release Notes
section.p:
This alpha integration build has the following disabilities:
path, addpath statements are not supported (this includes path searching)
include statement is implemented, but saving files containing include statements will also include all the content of includes files.
multiple templates are not supported
visual definition of template inputs and outputs is not implemented
cyclic referece check of templates not implemented
template instances are not revalidated when the template is changed
no updated documentation and user's manual
